page.title: 20Social Activities.
page.content: In Blackmore there are playgroups and a creche whilst the older children belong to traditional organisations like the{Guides and Scouts} There are several{youth clubs.}Both the Baptist Church and St.Laurence Church have active youth groups.{The village {hall}is used by many organisations .The sports and social club provides the sporting facilities There is the wives group, drama, flower club and a dancing school.The art society and keep fit meet at{the school.}For {the elderly}there is the Jericho Club which plans events and excursions. All organisations take part in the annual three day{village fayre}in May.There is a parade and street market, sporting events and dances. The men dress in smocks and the women in long skirts and mop caps.Blackmore Village Crier can be seen and heard.
